name: classes

count.name: count
count.description: Specify how many s-truncate:{lines} classes you want to generate

description:
This mixin generate all the truncate classes like s-truncate, s-truncate:2, etc...
The number of truncate classes generated is defined in the theme.helpers.truncate.count settings

package.name: @coffeekraken/s-postcss-sugar-plugin
package.description: Postcss Coffeekraken plugin that gives you access to a ton of sugar like "@sugar.when.dark", "@sugar.classes", etc... mixins as well as functions like "sugar.padding", "sugar.color", etc... All of these makes uses of your theme configuration defined using the @coffeekraken/s-sugar-config system.
package.author: Olivier Bossel <olivier.bossel@gmail.com> (https://coffeekraken.io)

docblocks.name: classes
docblocks.description:
This mixin generate all the truncate classes like s-truncate, s-truncate:2, etc...
The number of truncate classes generated is defined in the theme.helpers.truncate.count settings

count.name: count
count.description: Specify how many s-truncate:{lines} classes you want to generate

docblocks.raw:
/**
*
* @name           classes
* @as              @s.truncate.classes
* @namespace      node.mixin.truncate
* @type           PostcssMixin
* @platform      postcss
* @status        stable
*
* This mixin generate all the truncate classes like s-truncate, s-truncate:2, etc...
* The number of truncate classes generated is defined in the theme.helpers.truncate.count settings
*
* @param           {Number}            [count=__STheme.get('helpers.truncate.count')]          Specify how many s-truncate:{lines} classes you want to generate
* @return        {Css}         The generated css
*
* @snippet         @s.truncate.classes
*
* @example        css
* @s.truncate.classes;
*
* @since       2.0.0
* @author         Olivier Bossel <olivier.bossel@gmail.com> (https://coffeekraken.io)

*/
